title: Pagli Roman (a free display typeface)
content:
Pagli Roman is a display type which is a cross of Bodoni & Pistilli Roman and is free for personal & commercial use.

Go grab a copy here: [www.andrewpaglinawan.com/PagliRoman.zip](http://web.archive.org/web/20140717140625/http:/www.andrewpaglinawan.com/PagliRoman.zip "www.andrewpaglinawan.com/PagliRoman.zip")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140717140625im_/http:/typophile.com/files/PR_4008.jpg)
author: alienbreed

comments.content: Thank you mate. I enjoyed working with it.
License changed. You may now use it commercially for free too. Spread the love! =)
